mnd6:3.2: Jivitanti ayu thiti yapana yapana iriyana vattana palana jivitam jivitindriyam.
mnd6:3.3: Api ca dvihi karanehi appakam jivitam thokam jivitam—
mnd6:3.4: thitiparittataya va appakam jivitam, sarasaparittataya va appakam jivitam.
mnd6:3.6: Atite cittakkhane jivittha, na jivati na jivissati;
mnd6:3.7: anagate cittakkhane jivissati, na jivati na jivittha;
mnd6:3.8: paccuppanne cittakkhane jivati, na jivittha na jivissati.
mnd6:14.2: Assasupanibaddham jivitam, passasupanibaddham jivitam, assasapassasupanibaddham jivitam, mahabhutupanibaddham jivitam, kabalikaraharupanibaddham jivitam, usmupanibaddham jivitam, vinnanupanibaddham jivitam.
mnd6:14.3: Mulampi imesam dubbalam, pubbahetupi imesam dubbala, ye paccaya tepi dubbala, yepi pabhavika tepi dubbala, sahabhupi imesam dubbala, sampayogapi imesam dubbala, sahajapi imesam dubbala, yapi payojika sapi dubbala.
mnd6:14.4: Annamannam ime niccadubbala, annamannam anavatthita ime.
mnd6:14.5: Annamannam paripatayanti ime, annamannassa hi natthi tayita, na capi thapenti annamannam ime.
mnd6:17.1: Api ca catumaharajikanam devanam jivitam upadaya manussanam appakam jivitam parittam jivitam thokam jivitam khanikam jivitam lahukam jivitam ittaram jivitam anaddhaniyam jivitam naciratthitikam jivitam.
mnd6:17.7: brahmakayikanam devanam jivitam upadaya manussanam appakam jivitam parittam jivitam thokam jivitam khanikam jivitam lahukam jivitam ittaram jivitam anaddhaniyam jivitam naciratthitikam jivitam.
mnd6:17.9: “appamidam, bhikkhave, manussanam ayu, gamaniyo samparayo, mantaya boddhabbam, kattabbam kusalam, caritabbam brahmacariyam, natthi jatassa amaranam.
mnd6:17.10: Yo, bhikkhave, ciram jivati, so vassasatam appam va bhiyyo.
mnd6:22.2: Yo vassasatam atikkamitva jivati so ekam va vassam jivati,
mnd6:22.9: timsam va vassani jivati, cattarisam va vassani jivatiti—
mnd6:22.12: Yada jinno hoti vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto khandadanto palitakeso vilunam khalitasiro valinam tilakahatagatto vanko bhoggo dandaparayano, so jarayapi cavati marati antaradhayati vippalujjati, natthi maranamha mokkho.
mnd6:32.2: Janati khattiya ca brahmana ca vessa ca sudda ca gahattha ca pabbajita ca deva ca manussa ca.
mnd6:32.7: Mamayitam vatthum acchedasankinopi socanti, acchijjantepi socanti, acchinnepi socanti.
mnd6:32.8: Mamayitam vatthum viparinamasankinopi socanti, viparinamantepi socanti, viparinatepi socanti kilamanti paridevanti urattalim kandanti sammoham apajjantiti—
mnd6:33.6: Tanhapariggaho anicco sankhato paticcasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo viragadhammo nirodhadhammo viparinamadhammo.
mnd6:33.7: Ditthipariggahopi anicco sankhato paticcasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo viragadhammo nirodhadhammo viparinamadhammo.
mnd6:33.9: “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, tam pariggaham yvayam pariggaho nicco dhuvo sassato aviparinamadhammo sassatisamam tatheva tittheyya”ti?
mnd6:33.12: Ahampi kho tam, bhikkhave, pariggaham na samanupassami, yvayam pariggaho nicco dhuvo sassato aviparinamadhammo sassatisamam tatheva tittheyya”ti.
mnd6:33.13: Pariggaha nicca dhuva sassata aviparinamadhamma natthi na santi na samvijjanti na labbhantiti—
mnd6:34.2: Nanabhave vinabhave annathabhave sante samvijjamane upalabbhiyamane.
mnd6:34.6: Nanu etam, ananda, maya patikacceva akkhatam—
mnd6:34.9: yam tam jatam bhutam sankhatam palokadhammam tam vata ma palujji’ti.
mnd6:34.11: Purimanam purimanam khandhanam dhatunam ayatananam viparinamannathabhava pacchima pacchima khandha ca dhatuyo ca ayatanani ca pavattanti”ti—
mnd6:35.2: Ititi padasandhi padasamsaggo padaparipuri akkharasamavayo byanjanasilitthata padanupubbata metam.
mnd6:35.3: Ititi iti disva passitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva mamattesuti—
mnd6:35.5: Nagaramavaseti sabbam gharavasapalibodham chinditva puttadarapalibodham chinditva natipalibodham chinditva mittamaccapalibodham chinditva sannidhipalibodham chinditva kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajitva akincanabhavam upagantva eko careyya vihareyya iriyeyya vatteyya paleyya yapeyya yapeyyati—
mnd6:39.2: Marananti ya tesam tesam sattanam tamha tamha sattanikaya cuti cavanata bhedo antaradhanam maccumaranam kalankiriya khandhanam bhedo kalevarassa nikkhepo jivitindriyassupacchedo.
mnd6:42.4: Purisoti sankha samanna pannatti voharo namam namakammam namadheyyam nirutti byanjanam abhilapo.
mnd6:42.5: Mamidanti mannatiti tanhamannanaya mannati, ditthimannanaya mannati, manamannanaya mannati, kilesamannanaya mannati, duccaritamannanaya mannati, payogamannanaya mannati, vipakamannanaya mannatiti—
mnd6:43.2: Etam adinavam natva janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva mamattesuti, etampi viditva pandito dhiro pandito pannava buddhima nani vibhavi medhaviti—
mnd6:44.7: So bhagavantam mamayati, bhagava tam puggalam parigganhati.
mnd6:44.9: “ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kuha thaddha lapa singi unnala asamahita, na me te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mamaka;
mnd6:44.10: apagata ca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imasma dhammavinaya.
mnd6:44.11: Na ca te imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjanti.
mnd6:44.12: Ye ca kho te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nikkuha nillapa dhira atthaddha susamahita, te kho me, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mamaka;
mnd6:44.13: anapagata ca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imasma dhammavinaya.
mnd6:44.14: Te ca imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjanti.
mnd6:47.2: Mamako tanhamamattam pahaya ditthimamattam patinissajjitva mamattaya na nameyya na onameyya, na tanninno assa na tappono na tappabbharo na tadadhimutto na tadadhipateyyoti—
mnd6:51.4: Patibuddho puriso na passatiti yatha puriso supinagato candam passati, suriyam passati, mahasamuddam passati, sinerum pabbatarajanam passati, hatthim passati, assam passati, ratham passati, pattim passati, senabyuham passati, aramaramaneyyakam passati, vanaramaneyyakam … bhumiramaneyyakam … pokkharaniramaneyyakam passati;
mnd6:52.3: Piyayitam jananti mamayitam janam mataram va pitaram va bhataram va bhaginim va puttam va dhitaram va mittam va amaccam va natim va salohitam vati—
mnd6:53.3: Kalankatam na passati na dakkhati nadhigacchati na vindati na patilabhatiti—
mnd6:57.4: Te janati khattiya ca brahmana ca vessa ca sudda ca gahattha ca pabbajita ca deva ca manussa cati—
mnd6:58.2: Yesanti yesam khattiyanam brahmananam vessanam suddanam gahatthanam pabbajitanam devanam manussanam.
mnd6:58.3: Namanti sankha samanna pannatti voharo namam namakammam namadheyyam nirutti byanjanam abhilapo.
mnd6:58.4: Pavuccatiti vuccati pavuccati kathiyati bhaniyati dipiyati vohariyatiti—
mnd6:59.2: Rupagatam vedanagatam sannagatam sankharagatam vinnanagatam pahiyati jahiyati vijahiyati antaradhayati vippalujjati, namamyevavasissati.
mnd6:59.8: Jantunoti sattassa narassa manavassa posassa puggalassa jivassa jagussa jantussa indagussa manujassati—
mnd6:63.2: Sokoti natibyasanena va phutthassa bhogabyasanena va phutthassa rogabyasanena va phutthassa silabyasanena va phutthassa ditthibyasanena va phutthassa annatarannatarena byasanena samannagatassa annatarannatarena dukkhadhammena phutthassa soko socana socitattam antosoko antoparisoko antodaho antoparidaho cetaso parijjhayana domanassam sokasallam.
mnd6:63.4: ditthibyasanena va phutthassa annatarannatarena byasanena samannagatassa annatarannatarena dukkhadhammena phutthassa adevo paridevo adevana paridevana adevitattam paridevitattam vaca palapo vippalapo lalappo lalappayana lalappayitattam.
mnd6:63.7: Yam evarupam macchariyam maccharayana maccharayitattam veviccham kadariyam katukancukata aggahitattam cittassa—
mnd6:63.9: Api ca khandhamacchariyampi macchariyam, dhatumacchariyampi macchariyam, ayatanamacchariyampi macchariyam gaho—
mnd6:63.12: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
mnd6:63.17: Mamayitam vatthum acchedasankinopi socanti, acchijjantepi socanti, acchinnepi socanti, mamayitam vatthum viparinamasankinopi socanti, viparinamantepi socanti, viparinatepi socanti, mamayitam vatthum acchedasankinopi paridevanti, acchijjantepi paridevanti, acchinnepi paridevanti.
mnd6:63.18: Mamayitam vatthum viparinamasankinopi paridevanti, viparinamantepi paridevanti, viparinatepi paridevanti.
mnd6:63.19: Mamayitam vatthum rakkhanti gopenti parigganhanti mamayanti maccharayanti;
mnd6:63.20: mamayitasmim vatthusmim sokam na jahanti, paridevam na jahanti, macchariyam na jahanti, gedham na jahanti na pajahanti na vinodenti na byantim karonti na anabhavam gamentiti—
mnd6:64.2: Tasmati tasma tankarana tamhetu tappaccaya tamnidana etam adinavam sampassamana mamattesuti—
mnd6:64.5: Ya panna pajanana …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammaditthi.
mnd6:64.14: Munayo tanhapariggaham pariccajitva ditthipariggaham patinissajjitva cajitva pajahitva vinodetva byantim karitva anabhavam gametva acarimsu viharimsu iriyimsu vattimsu palimsu yapimsu yapimsu.
mnd6:64.16: Yo so sabbasankharasamatho sabbupadhipatinissaggo tanhakkhayo virago nirodho nibbanam.
mnd6:64.17: Khemadassinoti khemadassino tanadassino lenadassino saranadassino abhayadassino accutadassino amatadassino nibbanadassinoti—
mnd6:64.18: tasma munayo pariggaham hitva acarimsu khemadassino.
mnd6:68.5: Te tato tato cittam patilinenta patikutenta pativattenta sanniruddhanta sannigganhanta sannivarenta rakkhanta gopenta caranti vicaranti viharanti iriyanti vattenti palenti yapenti yapenti, cakkhudvare cittam patilinenta patikutenta pativattenta sanniruddhanta sannigganhanta sannivarenta rakkhanta gopenta caranti vicaranti viharanti iriyanti vattenti palenti yapenti yapenti,
mnd6:68.10: manodvare cittam patilinenta patikutenta pativattenta sanniruddhanta sannigganhanta sannivarenta rakkhanta gopenta caranti vicaranti viharanti iriyanti vattenti palenti yapenti yapenti.
mnd6:68.11: Yatha kukkutapattam va nharudaddulam va aggimhi pakkhittam patiliyati patikutati pativattati na sampasariyati;
mnd6:68.12: evamevam tato tato cittam patilinenta patikutenta pativattenta sanniruddhanta sannigganhanta sannivarenta rakkhanta gopenta caranti vicaranti viharanti iriyanti vattenti palenti yapenti yapenti, cakkhudvare cittam …
mnd6:68.17: manodvare cittam patilinenta patikutenta pativattenta sanniruddhanta sannigganhanta sannivarenta rakkhanta gopenta caranti vicaranti viharanti iriyanti vattenti palenti yapenti yapenti.
mnd6:68.19: Bhikkhunoti puthujjanakalyanakassa va bhikkhuno sekkhassa va bhikkhunoti—
mnd6:69.2: manco pitham bhisi tattika cammakhando tinasantharo pannasantharo palalasantharo.
mnd6:69.3: Tam asanam asappayarupadassanena rittam vivittam pavivittam, asappayasaddassavanena rittam vivittam pavivittam, asappayagandhaghayanena … asappayarasasayanena … asappayaphotthabbaphusanena … asappayehi pancahi kamagunehi rittam vivittam pavivittam.
mnd6:69.4: Tam vivittam asanam bhajato sambhajato sevato nisevato samsevato patisevatoti—
mnd6:70.1: Samaggiyamahu tassa tam, yo attanam bhavane na dassayeti.
mnd6:70.5: Bahu cepi bhikkhu samagga sammodamana avivadamana khirodakibhuta annamannam piyacakkhuhi sampassanta viharanti—
mnd6:70.8: Cattaro satipatthana, cattaro sammappadhana, cattaro iddhipada, pancindriyani, panca balani, satta bojjhanga, ariyo atthangiko maggo.
mnd6:70.9: Te ekato pakkhandanti pasidanti sampatitthanti vimuccanti;
mnd6:70.10: na tesam dhammanam vivado pavivado atthi—
mnd6:70.13: Bahu cepi bhikkhu anupadisesaya nibbanadhatuya parinibbayanti;
mnd6:70.14: na tesam nibbanadhatuya unattam va punnattam va pannayati—
mnd6:70.16: Bhavaneti nerayikanam nirayo bhavanam, tiracchanayonikanam tiracchanayoni bhavanam, pettivisayikanam pettivisayo bhavanam, manussanam manussaloko bhavanam, devanam devaloko bhavananti.
mnd6:70.17: Samaggiyamahu tassa tam, yo attanam bhavane na dassayeti.
mnd6:70.18: Tassesa samaggi etam channam etam patirupam etam anucchavikam etam anulomam, yo evam paticchanne niraye attanam na dasseyya, tiracchanayoniyam attanam na dasseyya, pettivisaye attanam na dasseyya, manussaloke attanam na dasseyya, devaloke attanam na dasseyyati evamahamsu evam kathenti evam bhananti evam dipayanti evam voharantiti—
mnd6:70.19: samaggiyamahu tassa tam, yo attanam bhavane na dassaye.
mnd6:74.3: cakkhunceva rupa ca, sotanca sadda ca, ghananca gandha ca, jivha ca rasa ca, kayo ca photthabba ca, mano ca dhamma ca.
mnd6:74.5: Monam vuccati nanam …pe… sangajalamaticca so muni.
mnd6:74.11: Muni tanhanissayam pahaya ditthinissayam patinissajjitva cakkhum anissito sotam anissito ghanam anissito jivham anissito kayam anissito manam anissito
mnd6:74.12: rupe … sadde … gandhe … rase … photthabbe … dhamme …
mnd6:74.13: kulam … ganam … avasam … labham … yasam … pasamsam … sukham … civaram … pindapatam … senasanam … gilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharam …
mnd6:74.14: kamadhatum … rupadhatum … arupadhatum … kamabhavam … rupabhavam … arupabhavam … sannabhavam … asannabhavam … nevasannanasannabhavam …
mnd6:74.17: dittham … sutam … mutam … vinnatam … sabbe dhamme anissito anallino anupagato anajjhosito anadhimutto nikkhanto nissato vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharatiti—
mnd6:75.5: Idha yassa te honti atthakama hitakama phasukama yogakkhemakama mata va pita va bhata va bhagini va putta va dhitara va mitta va amacca va nati va salohita va—
mnd6:75.8: Manapika rupa manapika sadda manapika gandha manapika rasa manapika photthabba—
mnd6:75.13: Idha yassa te honti anatthakama ahitakama aphasukama ayogakkhemakama jivita voropetukama—
mnd6:75.16: Amanapika rupa amanapika sadda amanapika gandha amanapika rasa amanapika photthabba—
mnd6:75.19: “Ayam me satto piyo, ime ca sankhara manapa”ti ragavasena piyam na karoti;
mnd6:75.20: “ayam me satto appiyo, ime ca sankhara amanapa”ti patighavasena appiyam na karoti na janeti na sanjaneti na nibbatteti nabhinibbattetiti—
mnd6:76.1: Tasmim paridevamaccharam panne vari yatha na limpatiti.
mnd6:76.3: Paridevoti natibyasanena va phutthassa bhogabyasanena va phutthassa rogabyasanena va phutthassa silabyasanena va phutthassa ditthibyasanena va phutthassa annatarannatarena byasanena samannagatassa annatarannatarena dukkhadhammena phutthassa adevo paridevo adevana paridevana adevitattam paridevitattam vaca palapo vippalapo lalappo lalappayana lalappayitattam.
mnd6:76.6: Yam evarupam macchariyam maccharayana maccharayitattam veviccham kadariyam katukancukata aggahitattam cittassa—
mnd6:76.8: Api ca khandhamacchariyampi macchariyam, dhatumacchariyampi macchariyam, ayatanamacchariyampi macchariyam gaho—
mnd6:77.4: Yatha vari padumapattam na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati alittam apalittam anupalittam, evamevam tasmim puggale arahante khinasave paridevo macchariyanca na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati alitta apalitta anupalitta.
mnd6:77.5: So ca puggalo arahanto tehi kilesehi na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati alitto apalitto anupalitto nikkhanto nissato vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharatiti—
mnd6:77.6: tasmim paridevamaccharam panne vari yatha na limpati.
mnd6:81.4: Yatha udabindu padumapatte na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati alittam apalittam anupalittanti—
mnd6:81.9: Yatha vari padumapuppham na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati alittam apalittam anupalittanti—
mnd6:82.1: Evam muni nopalimpati, yadidam ditthasutam mutesu vati.
mnd6:82.9: Muni tanhalepam pahaya ditthilepam patinissajjitva ditthe na limpati, sute na limpati, mute na limpati, vinnate na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati alitto apalitto anupalitto nikkhanto nissato vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharatiti—
mnd6:82.10: evam muni nopalimpati, yadidam ditthasutam mutesu va.
mnd6:86.1: Dhono na hi tena mannati, yadidam ditthasutam mutesu vati.
mnd6:86.3: Ya panna pajanana …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammaditthi.
mnd6:86.5: Taya pannaya kayaduccaritam dhutanca dhotanca sandhotanca niddhotanca,
mnd6:86.8: rago dhuto ca dhoto ca sandhoto ca niddhoto ca,
mnd6:86.30: sabbakusalabhisankhara dhuta ca dhota ca sandhota ca niddhota ca.
mnd6:87.1: Atha va sammaditthiya micchaditthi dhuta ca dhota ca sandhota ca niddhota ca,
mnd6:87.2: sammasankappena micchasankappo dhuto ca dhoto ca sandhoto ca niddhoto ca,
mnd6:87.10: sammavimuttiya micchavimutti dhuta ca dhota ca sandhota ca niddhota ca.
mnd6:88.1: Atha va ariyena atthangikena maggena sabbe kilesa …
mnd6:88.6: sabbakusalabhisankhara dhuta ca dhota ca sandhota ca niddhota ca.
mnd6:88.7: Araha imehi dhonehi dhammehi upeto samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samupapanno samannagato.
mnd6:89.1: Dhono na hi tena mannati, yadidam ditthasutam mutesu vati.
mnd6:89.2: Dhono dittham na mannati, ditthasmim na mannati, ditthato na mannati, dittha meti na mannati;
mnd6:89.3: sutam na mannati, sutasmim na mannati, sutato na mannati, sutam meti na mannati;
mnd6:89.4: mutam na mannati, mutasmim na mannati, mutato na mannati, mutam meti na mannati;
mnd6:89.5: vinnatam na mannati, vinnatasmim na mannati, vinnatato na mannati, vinnatam meti na mannati.
mnd6:89.7: “asmiti, bhikkhave, mannitametam, ayamahamasmiti mannitametam, bhavissanti mannitametam, na bhavissanti mannitametam, rupi bhavissanti mannitametam, arupi bhavissanti mannitametam, sanni bhavissanti mannitametam, asanni bhavissanti mannitametam, nevasanninasanni bhavissanti mannitametam.
mnd6:89.8: Mannitam, bhikkhave, rogo, mannitam gando, mannitam sallam, mannitam upaddavo.
mnd6:89.9: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, amannamanena cetasa viharissamati, evanhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabban”ti—
mnd6:89.10: dhono na hi tena mannati yadidam ditthasutam mutesu va.
mnd6:90.2: Dhono annena asuddhimaggena micchapatipadaya aniyyanikapathena annatra satipatthanehi annatra sammappadhanehi annatra iddhipadehi annatra indriyehi annatra balehi annatra bojjhangehi annatra ariya atthangika magga suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim muttim vimuttim parimuttim na icchati na sadiyati na pattheti na piheti nabhijappatiti—
mnd6:91.2: Sabbe balaputhujjana rajjanti, puthujjanakalyanakam upadaya satta sekkha virajjanti;
mnd6:91.4: Viratto so khaya ragassa vitaragatta, khaya dosassa vitadosatta, khaya mohassa vitamohatta.
mnd6:91.5: So vutthavaso cinnacarano …pe… jatijaramaranasamsaro, natthi tassa punabbhavoti—
mnd6:91.6: na hi so rajjati no virajjati.
mnd6:93.4: Na hi so rajjati no virajjati”ti.
